DOC.criteria: 1 . Adult subject ( male female ≥18 year ) ; 2 . Acute ischemic stroke occur within 14 day symptom onset 3 . Blood low density lipoprotein ( LDL ) ≧100mg/dl（2.59mmol/L） 4 . Patients prescribed statin discharge 5 . Patients sign informed consent 6 . Patients cell phone ability receive view message 1 . Noncerebrovascular event hemorrhagic stroke 2 . Patients serious heart , liver , kidney dysfunction coagulation disorder 3 . Patients circumstance may affect followup disturbance consciousness , severe depression mental disorder , aphasia 4 . Modified Rankin Scale score discharge ≥3 5 . Patients severe vision vision field impairment may affect patient read message cell phone 6 . Those participate clinical trial 7 . Those guarantee completion 6 month followup enrollment
